profileText: a Representative from California; born in San Diego, San Diego County, Calif., February 1, 1989; graduated from Torrey Pines High School, San Diego, Calif.; B.A., Columbia University, New York, N.Y., 2011; M.I.A., Columbia University, New York, N.Y., 2012; staff, United Nations, 2012-2014; staff, United States Department of State, 2014-2015; presidential campaign aide; nonprofit executive; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress in 2018; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
